Description:
We are a leading cement manufacturer and supplier, and we are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Sales Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in cement sales, with a proven track record of success in developing and executing sales strategies, managing and motivating sales teams, and achieving sales goals.Responsibilities:Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve sales goals and objectives.
Manage and motivate a team of sales representatives.
Build and maintain relationships with key customers.
Identify and develop new sales opportunities.
Negotiate and close sales contracts.
Track and analyze sales performance.
Develop and implement sales training programs.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Sales/ Marketing or equivalent
8+ years of experience in sales management, preferably in the cement industry.
Strong track record of success in achieving sales goals.
Excellent leadership and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
